game.name: Capture the planet: Cute War
game.shortDescription: Capture the planet: Cute War is an exciting arcade game where you play as heroic animals fighting for their life and freedom on a planet captured by evil enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Capture the planet: Cute War is an exciting arcade game where you play as heroic animals fighting for their life and freedom on a planet captured by evil enemies.

reviewHighlights.text: This game sucks. It's just an incredibly scuffed Angry Birds clone. Some levels are quite literally impossible without using power-ups, which is abysm...
